title: Jonathan Kodjia - Wikipedia
snippet: Kodjia joined Bristol City on a three-year deal for £2 million from Angers, with the option of a further year on 20 July 2015. He scored his first competitive goal for Bristol City on 15 August 2015 in a 4–2 defeat to Brentford, converting a pass from Luke Ayling to give City a 1–0 lead.

title: Jonathan Kodjia
snippet: Kodjia joined Bristol City on 20 July 2015, transferring from Angers for a fee of approximately £2 million and signing a three-year contract.[24][4] The forward quickly adapted to English football, making his competitive debut in the EFL Cup ...

title: Jonathan Kodjia Transfer News, History, Market Value (ETV) & Career Stats
snippet: Jonathan Kodjia (CIV) is a a poacher and currently plays for Versailles. Jonathan Kodjia is 35 years old (1989/10/22) and he is 189cm tall. His preferred foot is Right. His jersey number is 22.
